name: Marshmallow Luv
description:
A fun & simple game where you control a mug of hot chocolate, catch as many marshmallows as possible!

Every 10 seconds more marshmallows are added until it gradually becomes extremely difficult to catch them.

You have three lives, each marshmallow that hits the floor takes a life.

See how many you can catch and try and beat your high score.

I recommend playing in full screen mode.
